p: Computational analysis of % erythema, eye, liver, gastrointestinal tract, fascia, joint, mouth, and sclerosis scores revealed seven groups of patients with different clinical phenotypes and risks ( Online Supplementary Figure S1). viSNE analysis reduced the dimensionality of chronic GvHD organ scores, with patients who are more similar to each other shown closer together and patients who are more different from each other shown further apart on the scatterplot ( Figure 1). For example, a group of patients emerged with involvement of fascia and joints as well as skin sclerosis. In FlowSOM clustering analysis, this group of patients was labeled as Cluster 2 ( Figure 1).
